pony.name: Celestia Radio
pony.desc: 'All pony, all the time!', an online streaming radio station that specializes in pony based music and live programming. So stop clopping and turn it up!

pony.name: Alicorn Radio
pony.desc: A Brony Podcast talking about Brony stuff and the show we all enjoy... read fanfics, play games, talk about news, Rage about stuff and have every pony as best pony.

pony.name: Fillydelphia Radio
pony.desc: The Best of Variety Brony Music from across the fandom! Tune in at our website!

pony.name: BronyTunes Radio
pony.desc: The brony music app, made just for bronies. (twitter.com/BronyTunes)
